definition: side chain (used in classifying amino acids)
chain/cable (unit of length: 100 fathoms, about 185 m)/chain (unit of length: 66 feet, about 20 m)/to chain/to enchain

sentences.english: The chains might be side chains of proteoglycan.
sentences.chinese: 這種物質可能是蛋白多糖的側鏈。

sentences.english: The advances of side-chain polymeric liquid crystals as GLC stationary phases are described.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了側鏈高分子液晶作爲氣相色譜固定液的進展。

sentences.english: Oxidizing sidechain alkyl of benzene ring is one of the most important reactions in the organic synthesis.
sentences.chinese: 苯環側鏈氧化是有機合成反應中的重要反應類型之一。

sentences.english: Most of aromatic residues are exposed on the surface.
sentences.chinese: 側鏈芳香性氨基酸殘基大多數暴露在分子表面。

sentences.english: BCAA is sometimes used to refer to the having side-chains that are non-linear.
sentences.chinese: 支鏈氨基酸有時用來指非線性的側鏈。

sentences.english: These peaks correspond to side-chain cleavage of the ethyl and propyl groups respectively.
sentences.chinese: 這些峯分別相當於乙基和丙基的側鏈開裂。

sentences.english: The effects of the different side chains on the third-order nonlinear optical property have been studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了不同側鏈對聚合物三階非線性性能的影響。

sentences.english: The development of molecular design of side-chain liquid crystalline polymers at home and abroad is briefly described in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 簡述了近幾年國內外側鏈液晶高分子的分子設計進展。

sentences.english: The side chain structure of the β-alkyl naphthalenes studied influences significantly their way of dehydrocyclization.
sentences.chinese: 烷基萘的烷基側鏈結構對脫氫環化反應有明顯的影響。

sentences.english: In this investigetion, NMR data also reveals the segmental motions along ester alkyl side-chain in samples.
sentences.chinese: NMR參數還揭示了較長酯烷基側鏈鏈段運動情況。
